<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=744) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 231 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12)

**Prerequisites**
[Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=742)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [wizard feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=12/feats) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Arcana leads to...</title>
[Advanced Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=746)
name: Basic Arcana
